name: Windows 7 YouTube
description: YouTube but with a more "aero" aesthetic. Things are more reflective, colorful, and detailed rather than flat and materialistic, much like the Windows 7 operating system.
additional_info:
All icons and designs borrowed from any release of the Windows operating system is property of Microsoft Corp.. Any content borrowed from the Apple Emoji color typeface is property of Apple Computer Inc.. Content within this stylesheet cannot be used for commercial purposes and cannot be remixed or changed in any way. If this content is shared proper credit must be given. Please read here for more info: creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/

Release 1.1 (WIP)

  • Like and dislike buttons to be replaced
  • Video player to be completely renovated to look like Windows Media Player.
  • Subscribe button replaced
  • Channel pages renovated

Release 1.0

  • Search bar is thinner and wider. The search icon is made thinner and replaced by text.
  • Every video page has a subtle blue to white gradient on the background.
  • Sidebar items are made thinner and sidebar item icons are replaced.
  • Sidebar channel icons are smaller and less round.
  • Some other stuff
